prompt: एक फाइल में लाइनों, शब्दों और कैरेक्टर्स की गिनती करने वाली स्क्रिप्ट
code:
import sys
filename = sys.argv[1]
lines, words, chars = 0, 0, 0
with open(filename, 'r') as f:
    for line in f:
        lines += 1
        words += len(line.split())
        chars += len(line)
print(f'Lines: {lines}, Words: {words}, Chars: {chars}')

prompt: Fetch API में `AbortController` का उपयोग करके एक रिक्वेस्ट को कैंसिल करो
एक नया पोस्ट बनाने के बाद यूज़र को उस पोस्ट के पेज पर रीडायरेक्ट करो
एक API कॉल के लिए एक टाइमआउट सेट करो
code:
"<script>
const controller = new AbortController();
const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => controller.abort(), 5000); // 5 second timeout

fetch('/api/slow-endpoint', {signal: controller.signal})
  .catch(error => { if (error.name === 'AbortError') console.error('Request timed out!'); })
  .finally(() => clearTimeout(timeoutId));
</script>"

code:
"# In models.py
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
db = SQLAlchemy()

class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)

class Post(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    title = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    content = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False)
    author_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('user.id'))"

prompt: एक नया ब्लॉग पोस्ट बनाने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts', methods=['POST'])
def create_post():
    data = request.json
    new_post = Post(title=data['title'], content=data['content'])
    db.session.add(new_post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'id': new_post.id}), 201"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग पोस्ट को अपडेट करने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts/<int:post_id>', methods=['PUT'])
def update_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    data = request.json
    post.title = data.get('title', post.title)
    post.content = data.get('content', post.content)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post updated'})"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग पोस्ट को डिलीट करने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ

"@app.route('/api/posts/<int:post_id>', methods=['DELETE'])
def delete_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    db.session.delete(post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post deleted'})"

prompt: एक फंक्शन बनाओ जो टाइटल से एक स्लग जेनरेट करे
code:
"import re
def slugify(text):
    text = text.lower().strip()
    text = re.sub(r'[^\w\s-]', '', text)
    text = re.sub(r'[\s_-]+', '-', text)
    return text"

prompt: Fetch API में `AbortController` का उपयोग करके एक रिक्वेस्ट को कैंसिल करो
एक नया पोस्ट बनाने के बाद यूज़र को उस पोस्ट के पेज पर रीडायरेक्ट करो
एक API कॉल के लिए एक टाइमआउट सेट करो
code:
"<script>
const controller = new AbortController();
const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => controller.abort(), 5000); // 5 second timeout

fetch('/api/slow-endpoint', {signal: controller.signal})
  .catch(error => { if (error.name === 'AbortError') console.error('Request timed out!'); })
  .finally(() => clearTimeout(timeoutId));
</script>"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग के लिए User और Post डेटाबेस मॉडल बनाओ
code:
"# In models.py
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
db = SQLAlchemy()

class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)

class Post(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    title = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    content = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False)
    author_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('user.id'))"

def get_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    return jsonify({'title': post.title, 'content': post.content})"

prompt: एक नया ब्लॉग पोस्ट बनाने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts', methods=['POST'])
def create_post():
    data = request.json
    new_post = Post(title=data['title'], content=data['content'])
    db.session.add(new_post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'id': new_post.id}), 201"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग पोस्ट को अपडेट करने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts/<int:post_id>', methods=['PUT'])
def update_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    data = request.json
    post.title = data.get('title', post.title)
    post.content = data.get('content', post.content)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post updated'})"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग पोस्ट को डिलीट करने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts/<int:post_id>', methods=['DELETE'])
def delete_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    db.session.delete(post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post deleted'})"

prompt: एक फंक्शन बनाओ जो टाइटल से एक स्लग जेनरेट करे
code:
"import re
def slugify(text):
    text = text.lower().strip()
    text = re.sub(r'[^\w\s-]', '', text)
    text = re.sub(r'[\s_-]+', '-', text)
    return text"

prompt: एक फाइल में लाइनों, शब्दों और कैरेक्टर्स की गिनती करने वाली स्क्रिप्ट
code:
import sys
filename = sys.argv[1]
lines, words, chars = 0, 0, 0
with open(filename, 'r') as f:
    for line in f:
        lines += 1
        words += len(line.split())
        chars += len(line)
print(f'Lines: {lines}, Words: {words}, Chars: {chars}')

code:
"<script>
const controller = new AbortController();
const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => controller.abort(), 5000); // 5 second timeout

fetch('/api/slow-endpoint', {signal: controller.signal})
  .catch(error => { if (error.name === 'AbortError') console.error('Request timed out!'); })
  .finally(() => clearTimeout(timeoutId));
</script>"

code:
"# In models.py
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
db = SQLAlchemy()

class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)

class Post(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    title = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    content = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False)
    author_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('user.id'))"

prompt: एक नया ब्लॉग पोस्ट बनाने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts', methods=['POST'])
def create_post():
    data = request.json
    new_post = Post(title=data['title'], content=data['content'])
    db.session.add(new_post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'id': new_post.id}), 201"

"@app.route('/api/posts/<int:post_id>', methods=['PUT'])
def update_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    data = request.json
    post.title = data.get('title', post.title)
    post.content = data.get('content', post.content)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post updated'})"

"import re
def slugify(text):
    text = text.lower().strip()
    text = re.sub(r'[^\w\s-]', '', text)
    text = re.sub(r'[\s_-]+', '-', text)
    return text"

prompt: Fetch API में `AbortController` का उपयोग करके एक रिक्वेस्ट को कैंसिल करो
एक नया पोस्ट बनाने के बाद यूज़र को उस पोस्ट के पेज पर रीडायरेक्ट करो
एक API कॉल के लिए एक टाइमआउट सेट करो
code:
"<script>
const controller = new AbortController();
const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => controller.abort(), 5000); // 5 second timeout

fetch('/api/slow-endpoint', {signal: controller.signal})
  .catch(error => { if (error.name === 'AbortError') console.error('Request timed out!'); })
  .finally(() => clearTimeout(timeoutId));
</script>"

code:
"# In models.py
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
db = SQLAlchemy()

class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)

class Post(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    title = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    content = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False)
    author_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('user.id'))"

prompt: एक नया ब्लॉग पोस्ट बनाने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts', methods=['POST'])
def create_post():
    data = request.json
    new_post = Post(title=data['title'], content=data['content'])
    db.session.add(new_post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'id': new_post.id}), 201"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग पोस्ट को अपडेट करने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts/<int:post_id>', methods=['PUT'])
def update_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    data = request.json
    post.title = data.get('title', post.title)
    post.content = data.get('content', post.content)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post updated'})"

def delete_post(post_id):

    db.session.delete(post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post deleted'})"

prompt: एक फंक्शन बनाओ जो टाइटल से एक स्लग जेनरेट करे
code:
"import re
def slugify(text):
    text = text.lower().strip()
    text = re.sub(r'[^\w\s-]', '', text)
    text = re.sub(r'[\s_-]+', '-', text)
    return text"

code:
"<script>
const controller = new AbortController();
const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => controller.abort(), 5000); // 5 second timeout

fetch('/api/slow-endpoint', {signal: controller.signal})
  .catch(error => { if (error.name === 'AbortError') console.error('Request timed out!'); })
  .finally(() => clearTimeout(timeoutId));
</script>"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग के लिए User और Post डेटाबेस मॉडल बनाओ
code:
"# In models.py
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy
db = SQLAlchemy()

class User(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    username = db.Column(db.String(80), unique=True, nullable=False)

class Post(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    title = db.Column(db.String(120), nullable=False)
    content = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False)
    author_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('user.id'))"

prompt: एक नया ब्लॉग पोस्ट बनाने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts', methods=['POST'])
def create_post():
    data = request.json
    new_post = Post(title=data['title'], content=data['content'])
    db.session.add(new_post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'id': new_post.id}), 201"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग पोस्ट को अपडेट करने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts/<int:post_id>', methods=['PUT'])
def update_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    data = request.json
    post.title = data.get('title', post.title)
    post.content = data.get('content', post.content)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post updated'})"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग पोस्ट को डिलीट करने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts/<int:post_id>', methods=['DELETE'])
def delete_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    db.session.delete(post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post deleted'})"

prompt: MVC (Model-View-Controller) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // An architectural pattern that separates an application into three main logical components: the Model (handles data and business logic), the View (handles the UI and presentation), and the Controller (handles user input and coordinates between Model and View).

prompt: MVP (Model-View-Presenter) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A derivation of the MVC pattern where the Presenter assumes the functionality of the 'middle-man'. The Presenter handles all UI events on behalf of the View and updates the Model.

prompt: MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // An architectural pattern that facilitates a separation of the UI (the View) from the business logic (the Model) via a ViewModel, which acts as a data binder and command handler.

prompt: मोनोलिथिक (Monolithic) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A software application architecture in which a logically distinguishable application is built as a single, indivisible unit. All components are tightly coupled and run as a single service.

prompt: माइक्रोसर्विसेज (Microservices) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // An architectural style that structures an application as a collection of loosely coupled, independently deployable services, where each service represents a specific business capability.

prompt: इवेंट-ड्रिवन (Event-Driven) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A software architecture paradigm promoting the production, detection, consumption of, and reaction to events. This pattern enables minimum coupling, making it a good option for modern, distributed applications.

prompt: CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation) का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A pattern that separates read (Query) and update (Command) operations for a data store. Commands are processed by one set of models and infrastructure, while Queries are handled by another.

prompt: एक API Gateway डिजाइन पैटर्न
code: // A design pattern where a server acts as the single entry point for a group of microservices. It handles tasks like routing, authentication, rate limiting, and request aggregation.

prompt: एक Circuit Breaker डिजाइन पैटर्न
code: // A design pattern used in modern software development to detect failures and encapsulate the logic of preventing a failure from constantly recurring, allowing a failing service to recover.

prompt: एक Service Discovery पैटर्न
code: // The process of automatically detecting devices and services on a network. It's a core component of microservices architecture, allowing services to find and communicate with each other dynamically.

prompt: एक Pub/Sub (Publish-Subscribe) पैटर्न
code: // A messaging pattern where senders of messages (publishers) do not programmatically send their messages to specific receivers (subscribers). Instead, they publish messages to a topic, and subscribers receive messages from topics they are subscribed to.

prompt: एक Repository पैटर्न का ढाँचा
एक Unit of Work पैटर्न का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A pattern that maintains a list of objects affected by a business transaction and coordinates the writing out of changes and the resolution of concurrency problems.

prompt: एक Dependency Injection (DI) का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A design pattern in which an object or function receives other objects or functions that it depends on (its dependencies), rather than creating them internally.

prompt: Inversion of Control (IoC) का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A programming principle where custom-written portions of a computer program receive the flow of control from a generic, reusable framework. A framework with a Dependency Injection container is an example.

prompt: SOLID सिद्धांत: Single Responsibility Principle (SRP)
code: // A class, module, or function should have one, and only one, reason to change. It should be responsible for a single part of the application's functionality.

prompt: SOLID सिद्धांत: Open/Closed Principle (OCP)
code: // Software entities (classes, modules, functions, etc.) should be open for extension, but closed for modification.

prompt: SOLID सिद्धांत: Liskov Substitution Principle (LSP)
code: // Subtypes must be substitutable for their base types. Objects of a superclass shall be replaceable with objects of its subclasses without breaking the application.

prompt: SOLID सिद्धांत: Interface Segregation Principle (ISP)
code: // No client should be forced to depend on methods it does not use. It's better to have many smaller, client-specific interfaces than one large, general-purpose one.

prompt: SOLID सिद्धांत: Dependency Inversion Principle (DIP)
code: // High-level modules should not depend on low-level modules. Both should depend on abstractions (e.g., interfaces). Abstractions should not depend on details.

prompt: DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) सिद्धांत
code: // A principle of software development aimed at reducing repetition of information of all kinds, especially in systems with many layers. 'Every piece of knowledge must have a single, unambiguous, authoritative representation within a system.'

prompt: KISS (Keep It Simple, Stupid) सिद्धांत
code: // A design principle that states that most systems work best if they are kept simple rather than made complicated; therefore, simplicity should be a key goal in design and unnecessary complexity should be avoided.

prompt: YAGNI (You Ain't Gonna Need It) सिद्धांत
code: // A principle of extreme programming (XP) that states a programmer should not add functionality until deemed necessary. 'Always implement things when you actually need them, never when you just foresee that you need them.'

prompt: Domain-Driven Design (DDD) का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A major software design approach, focusing on modeling software to match a real-world system or domain, according to input from that domain's experts. It's about creating a common, ubiquitous language between developers and users.

prompt: Fetch API में `AbortController` का उपयोग करके एक रिक्वेस्ट को कैंसिल करो
एक नया पोस्ट बनाने के बाद यूज़र को उस पोस्ट के पेज पर रीडायरेक्ट करो
एक API कॉल के लिए एक टाइमआउट सेट करो
code:
"<script>
const controller = new AbortController();
const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => controller.abort(), 5000); // 5 second timeout

fetch('/api/slow-endpoint', {signal: controller.signal})
  .catch(error => { if (error.name === 'AbortError') console.error('Request timed out!'); })
  .finally(() => clearTimeout(timeoutId));
</script>"

prompt: MVC (Model-View-Controller) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // An architectural pattern that separates an application into three main logical components: the model (data and business logic), the view (UI), and the controller (handles input).

prompt: MVP (Model-View-Presenter) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A derivation of the MVC pattern where the Presenter assumes the functionality of the 'middle-man'. The Presenter handles all UI events on behalf of the view.

prompt: MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // An architectural pattern that facilitates a separation of the user interface (the View) from the business logic and data (the Model) via a ViewModel.

prompt: मोनोलिथिक (Monolithic) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A software application architecture in which a logically distinguishable application is built as a single, indivisible unit. All components are tightly coupled and run as a single service.

prompt: माइक्रोसर्विसेज (Microservices) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // An architectural style that structures an application as a collection of loosely coupled, independently deployable services, each representing a business capability.

prompt: इवेंट-ड्रिवन (Event-Driven) आर्किटेक्चर का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A software architecture paradigm promoting the production, detection, consumption of, and reaction to events. This pattern enables minimum coupling, making it a good option for modern, distributed applications.

prompt: CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation) का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A pattern that separates read and update operations for a data store. Commands update data, and Queries read data.

prompt: एक API Gateway डिजाइन पैटर्न
code: // A design pattern where a server acts as a single entry point for a group of microservices. It handles tasks like routing, authentication, and rate limiting.

prompt: एक Circuit Breaker डिजाइन पैटर्न
code: // A design pattern used in modern software development to detect failures and encapsulate the logic of preventing a failure from constantly recurring during maintenance, temporary server failure or unexpected system difficulties.

prompt: एक Service Discovery पैटर्न
code: // The process of automatically detecting devices and services on a network. It's a core component of microservices architecture.

prompt: एक Pub/Sub (Publish-Subscribe) पैटर्न
code: // A messaging pattern where senders of messages (publishers) do not programmatically send their messages to specific receivers (subscribers). Instead, they publish messages to a topic, and subscribers receive messages from topics they subscribe to.

prompt: एक Unit of Work पैटर्न का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A pattern that maintains a list of objects affected by a business transaction and coordinates the writing out of changes and the resolution of concurrency problems.

prompt: एक Dependency Injection (DI) का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A design pattern in which an object or function receives other objects or functions that it depends on, rather than creating them internally.

prompt: Inversion of Control (IoC) का कॉन्सेप्ट
code: // A programming principle where custom-written portions of a computer program receive the flow of control from a generic, reusable framework. A framework with a DI container is an example.

prompt: SOLID सिद्धांत: Single Responsibility Principle (SRP)
code: // A class, module, or function should have one, and only one, reason to change. It should have only one job.

prompt: SOLID सिद्धांत: Open/Closed Principle (OCP)
code: // Software entities (classes, modules, functions, etc.) should be open for extension, but closed for modification.

prompt: SOLID सिद्धांत: Liskov Substitution Principle (LSP)
code: // Subtypes must be substitutable for their base types. Objects of a superclass shall be replaceable with objects of its subclasses without breaking the application.

prompt: SOLID सिद्धांत: Interface Segregation Principle (ISP)
code: // No client should be forced to depend on methods it does not use. It's better to have many smaller, specific interfaces than one large, general-purpose one.

prompt: SOLID सिद्धांत: Dependency Inversion Principle (DIP)
code: // High-level modules should not depend on low-level modules. Both should depend on abstractions (e.g., interfaces). Abstractions should not depend on details.

prompt: DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) सिद्धांत
code: // A principle of software development aimed at reducing repetition of information of all kinds, especially in systems with many layers.

prompt: KISS (Keep It Simple, Stupid) सिद्धांत
code: // A design principle that states that most systems work best if they are kept simple rather than made complicated; therefore, simplicity should be a key goal in design.

prompt: YAGNI (You Ain't Gonna Need It) सिद्धांत
code: // A principle of extreme programming (XP) that states a programmer should not add functionality until deemed necessary. 'Always implement things when you actually need them, never when you just foresee that you need them.'

prompt: Domain-Driven Design (DDD) का कॉन्सेप्ट

code:
"<script>
const controller = new AbortController();
const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => controller.abort(), 5000); // 5 second timeout

fetch('/api/slow-endpoint', {signal: controller.signal})
  .catch(error => { if (error.name === 'AbortError') console.error('Request timed out!'); })
  .finally(() => clearTimeout(timeoutId));
</script>"

"@app.route('/api/posts/<int:post_id>', methods=['PUT'])
def update_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    data = request.json
    post.title = data.get('title', post.title)
    post.content = data.get('content', post.content)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post updated'})"

"import re
def slugify(text):
    text = text.lower().strip()
    text = re.sub(r'[^\w\s-]', '', text)
    text = re.sub(r'[\s_-]+', '-', text)
    return text"

prompt: एक Flask API का बेसिक ढाँचा बनाओ
सभी प्रोडक्ट्स को लौटाने के लिए एक GET एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
एक प्रोडक्ट को उसकी ID से पाने के लिए एक GET एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/products/<int:product_id>', methods=['GET'])
def get_product(product_id):
    product = next((p for p in products if p['id'] == product_id), None)
    return jsonify(product) if product else ('', 404)"

prompt: एक नया प्रोडक्ट बनाने के लिए एक POST एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
एक प्रोडक्ट को अपडेट करने के लिए एक PUT एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/products/<int:product_id>', methods=['PUT'])
def update_product(product_id):
    product = next((p for p in products if p['id'] == product_id), None)
    if not product: return '', 404
    product.update(request.json)
    return jsonify(product)"

prompt: एक प्रोडक्ट को डिलीट करने के लिए एक DELETE एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/products/<int:product_id>', methods=['DELETE'])
def delete_product(product_id):
    global products
    products = [p for p in products if p['id'] != product_id]
    return '', 204"

    return jsonify(paginated_items)"

@app.websocket('/ws')
async def websocket_endpoint(websocket: WebSocket):

"@app.route('/api/posts', methods=['POST'])
def create_post():
    data = request.json
    new_post = Post(title=data['title'], content=data['content'])
    db.session.add(new_post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'id': new_post.id}), 201"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग पोस्ट को अपडेट करने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ
code:
"@app.route('/api/posts/<int:post_id>', methods=['PUT'])
def update_post(post_id):
    post = Post.query.get_or_404(post_id)
    data = request.json
    post.title = data.get('title', post.title)
    post.content = data.get('content', post.content)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post updated'})"

prompt: एक ब्लॉग पोस्ट को डिलीट करने के लिए एक API एंडपॉइंट बनाओ

def delete_post(post_id):

    db.session.delete(post)
    db.session.commit()
    return jsonify({'message': 'Post deleted'})"

"from flask_wtf import FlaskForm
from wtforms import StringField, PasswordField
from wtforms.validators import DataRequired, Email, Length

class RegistrationForm(FlaskForm):
    username = StringField('Username', validators=[DataRequired(), Length(min=4)])
    email = StringField('Email', validators=[DataRequired(), Email()])
    password = PasswordField('Password', validators=[DataRequired()])"

import redis
r = redis.Redis(decode_responses=True)

def get_user(user_id):
    cached_user = r.get(f'user:{user_id}')
    if cached_user:
        return cached_user
    # ... get user from database ...
    r.set(f'user:{user_id}', user_data, ex=3600) # Cache for 1 hour
    return user_data

"from urllib.parse import urlparse

def is_safe_redirect_url(target):
    # Check if the target URL is on the same host
    host_url = urlparse(request.host_url)
    target_url = urlparse(urljoin(request.host_url, target))
    return target_url.scheme in ('http', 'https') and host_url.netloc == target_url.netloc"

prompt: मेमोइज़ेशन (Memoization) का उपयोग करके फिबोनैची को ऑप्टिमाइज़ करो
डायनामिक प्रोग्रामिंग (टैबुलेशन) का उपयोग करके फिबोनैची निकालो
एक बाइनरी सर्च (binary search) एल्गोरिथ्म लिखो
code:
def binary_search(arr, target):
    left, right = 0, len(arr) - 1
    while left <= right:
        mid = (left + right) // 2
        if arr[mid] == target: return mid
        elif arr[mid] < target: left = mid + 1
        else: right = mid - 1
    return -1

prompt: एक बबल सॉर्ट (bubble sort) एल्गोरिथ्म लिखो
एक क्विक सॉर्ट (quick sort) एल्गोरिथ्म लिखो
code:
def quick_sort(arr):
    if len(arr) <= 1: return arr
    pivot = arr[len(arr) // 2]
    left = [x for x in arr if x < pivot]
    middle = [x for x in arr if x == pivot]
    right = [x for x in arr if x > pivot]
    return quick_sort(left) + middle + quick_sort(right)

prompt: एक मर्ज सॉर्ट (merge sort) एल्गोरिथ्म का ढाँचा लिखो
code:
def merge_sort(arr):
    if len(arr) > 1:
        mid = len(arr)//2
        L = arr[:mid]
        R = arr[mid:]
        merge_sort(L)
        merge_sort(R)
        # ... Merging logic here ...

prompt: यूनियन-फाइंड (Union-Find) डेटा स्ट्रक्चर का ढाँचा
काडन्स एल्गोरिथ्म (Kadane's Algorithm) का उपयोग करो
code:
def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_so_far = -float('inf')
    max_ending_here = 0
    for x in arr:
        max_ending_here = max_ending_here + x
        if max_so_far < max_ending_here: max_so_far = max_ending_here
        if max_ending_here < 0: max_ending_here = 0
    return max_so_far

import redis
r = redis.Redis()

def get_data():
    cached = r.get('my_key')
    if cached: return cached
    # ... get from db ...
    r.set('my_key', data, ex=3600)
    return data

code:
import time
def timer_decorator(func):
    def wrapper(*args, **kwargs):
        start_time = time.time()
        result = func(*args, **kwargs)
        print(f'Finished in {time.time() - start_time}s')
        return result
    return wrapper

    for i in range(3):
        yield i

async def main():
    async for item in async_generator():
        print(item)
asyncio.run(main())

prompt: मेमोइज़ेशन (Memoization) का उपयोग करके फिबोनैची को ऑप्टिमाइज़ करो
डायनामिक प्रोग्रामिंग (टैबुलेशन) का उपयोग करके फिबोनैची निकालो
एक बाइनरी सर्च (binary search) एल्गोरिथ्म लिखो
code:
def binary_search(arr, target):
    left, right = 0, len(arr) - 1
    while left <= right:
        mid = (left + right) // 2
        if arr[mid] == target: return mid
        elif arr[mid] < target: left = mid + 1
        else: right = mid - 1
    return -1

prompt: एक बबल सॉर्ट (bubble sort) एल्गोरिथ्म लिखो
एक क्विक सॉर्ट (quick sort) एल्गोरिथ्म लिखो
code:
def quick_sort(arr):
    if len(arr) <= 1: return arr
    pivot = arr[len(arr) // 2]
    left = [x for x in arr if x < pivot]
    middle = [x for x in arr if x == pivot]
    right = [x for x in arr if x > pivot]
    return quick_sort(left) + middle + quick_sort(right)

prompt: यूनियन-फाइंड (Union-Find) डेटा स्ट्रक्चर का ढाँचा
काडन्स एल्गोरिथ्म (Kadane's Algorithm) का उपयोग करो
code:
def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_so_far = -float('inf')
    max_ending_here = 0
    for x in arr:
        max_ending_here = max_ending_here + x
        if max_so_far < max_ending_here: max_so_far = max_ending_here
        if max_ending_here < 0: max_ending_here = 0
    return max_so_far

def merge_sort(arr):
    if len(arr) > 1:
        mid = len(arr)//2
        L = arr[:mid]
        R = arr[mid:]
        merge_sort(L)
        merge_sort(R)
        # ... Merging logic here ...

prompt: एक नंबर आर्मस्ट्रांग नंबर है या नहीं, यह चेक करो
code:
def is_armstrong(num):
    order = len(str(num))
    sum = 0
    temp = num
    while temp > 0:
        digit = temp % 10
        sum += digit ** order
        temp //= 10
    return num == sum

import math
def is_perfect_square(n):
    if n < 0: return False
    sqrt_n = int(math.sqrt(n))
    return sqrt_n * sqrt_n == n

prompt: टावर्स ऑफ हनोई (Towers of Hanoi) प्रॉब्लम को हल करो
code:
def towers_of_hanoi(n, source, destination, auxiliary):
    if n == 1:
        print(f'Move disk 1 from {source} to {destination}')
        return
    towers_of_hanoi(n-1, source, auxiliary, destination)
    print(f'Move disk {n} from {source} to {destination}')
    towers_of_hanoi(n-1, auxiliary, destination, source)

prompt: एक पाइथन स्क्रिप्ट बनाओ जो एक फाइल में लाइनों, शब्दों और कैरेक्टर्स की गिनती करे
code:
import sys
filename = sys.argv[1]
lines = 0
words = 0
chars = 0
with open(filename, 'r') as f:
    for line in f:
        lines += 1
        words += len(line.split())
        chars += len(line)
print(f'Lines: {lines}, Words: {words}, Characters: {chars}')

import csv
import json

csv_file_path = 'data.csv'
json_file_path = 'data.json'

data = []
with open(csv_file_path, 'r') as f:
    csv_reader = csv.DictReader(f)
    for row in csv_reader:
        data.append(row)

with open(json_file_path, 'w') as f:
    json.dump(data, f, indent=4)

prompt: एक सिंपल लॉगइन API बनाओ जो यूजरनेम और पासवर्ड चेक करे
एक लाइव सर्च के लिए Flask API बनाओ
code:
"# In app.py:
from flask import request, jsonify
items = ['Apple', 'Avocado', 'Banana', 'Apricot']
@app.route('/api/search')
def search_api():
    query = request.args.get('q', '').lower()
    results = [item for item in items if query in item.lower()]
    return jsonify(results)"

@app.route('/api/products')
def get_products():

prompt: एक HTML पेज बनाओ जो वेबसॉकेट (WebSocket) से कनेक्ट हो
एक सिंपल पाइथन वेबसॉकेट सर्वर का ढाँचा
code:
"import asyncio
import websockets

async def handler(websocket):
    async for message in websocket:
        print(f'Received: {message}')

async def main():
    async with websockets.serve(handler, 'localhost', 8080):
        await asyncio.Future() # run forever"
